name: Energy & Metabolic Control Stack
mechanism: MOTS-c enhances mitochondrial function and acts as an exercise mimetic via AMPK activation. Retatrutide provides comprehensive metabolic regulation through triple receptor agonism (GIP, GLP-1, glucagon)
cycling: MOTS-c: 8-12 weeks on, 4 weeks off. Retatrutide: per medical protocol
synergy_notes: MOTS-c enhances mitochondrial capacity while Retatrutide optimizes metabolic signaling
considerations: Monitor for GI side effects with Retatrutide
